website_summaries.verdict: It's a versatile chair with a lot to offer for a reasonable price, but it comes with some quality and design issues.
pros: A high chair, booster seat, and toddler seat combo
Other convenient features include its reclining seat and dishwasher-safe tray
cons: Tray is somewhat difficult to remove and replace

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to plug the hole
customer_reviews.text: I see what others were talking about regarding the hole where the buckle strap goes in in the bottom. I’m glad I had a heads up! As I put the chair together, I took some thick tape (maybe electric tape? I’m not sure) stuffed it in like putty, and plugged up the hole. Works like a charm! I recommend doing the same. Love that this chair rolls from room to room, and that it can lean back. I can wheel her around and she watches me do dishes, laundry, etc, and she can lay back or eat a snack. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Timberowl

customer_reviews.title: Grows with the family!
customer_reviews.text: We love this highchair so much! It's incredibly easy to clean with the pop off cover and it's very versatile for to grow with our kiddo. You can even use it for 2 kids at once (booster and high chair strapped to a chair). We recommend this high chair to everyone starting a family. We added a sticky hook to the back to hold bibs, but then realized there's actually a perfect storage "cubby" for them in the booster part (see image).
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: The material stains easily which is a bummer, but the more significant concerns lay within the crumb crevice and wheels. The crevice isn’t cleanable so I would not recommend this for a high moisture area. Most importantly, the wheels. The two front wheels broke off while my 40 pound child was in it. The weight limit claims 50 pounds. I haven’t contacted the company yet, but I’m pretty upset. The highchair isn’t even a year old, so this is especially frustrating. We weren’t hard on the highchair, so this should not have happened.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Singleton

customer_reviews.title: there is no way to tighten frame and it's super wobbly. Worst buy of the year
customer_reviews.text: This highchair is so generic they should give it away. It's so unstable I feared for my son's safety. The back won't stay in the plastic notches, so the back will break away or recline when you don't expect it.... there is no way to tighten frame and it's super wobbly. Worst buy of the year!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: This chair is multi-purpose and excellent if you have two young children of different ages. You can use the "seat" part as a booster, strapped onto another chair, while the "stand" works as a toddler chair. The straps get a bit twisted and the wheels don't lock well, but at this (low!) price point, I'm quite happy with the chair. (Also, the pattern and colors are a bit more vibrant and cuter in person than they appeared in the pictures.)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the chair and would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my baby. We started using it from her 4 month as she wants to sit straight and would not sit in anything with incline back. This way she can sit with us at the table and I do not need to hold her. We r not using the table tray yet as she eats just formula from the bottle. It has adjustable back to change the angle of the incline. Has four wheels and stoppers on the back row. Has two trays, so u can eat from the first, then play on the second once the dirty one removed for cleaning. Seems very comfortable for my daughter and convenient for me
customer_reviews.author: masha

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!! Parts do not fit together ...
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY!!! Parts do not fit together. Also, the chair I got had been returned by someone else! the parts inside were unpackaged and slightly damaged! Apparently, they are shipping stuff other people return, without inspecting them! When you have a little one and so many things you need to take care of, returning stuff is the last thing you really want to deal with!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this high chair. It's very easy to use! The tray comes off easily and there is a front button so that you can take the whole thing off with one hand - great for when you are carrying a fussy baby. The wheels lock easily and the recline feature is simple. The only issue is we read the reviews ahead of time about the hole in the seat which you could never clean the inside of - we are planning to tape over that area before using it with any food. So far we have just used it to occupy baby for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Inuwa

customer_reviews.title: The only one you need to buy
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor, and buy a 3-1 high chair. Save money and space! Used the entire system with my kid, and being able to adjust it as they grow is huge! At this point, we have taken off the back and the lap table and it is a great boosted seat right up to the dining table. Has some form of seat belts at every stage too - which have been extremely important and useful. Super safe, good size, not unbalanced or top heavy and has never fallen over or tipped. Easy to modify as your child's needs evolve. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: J&J Z

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, easy to clean, and most importantly, the baby likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product due to the combination of reviews and versatility of the high chair. This product should allow the baby to grow with the chair and have the chair adapt to the changing needs of the baby. Installation was a breeze and was able to watch the cover sheet with ease. I would purchase this product again if given the opportunity and recommend this to anyone looking for a quality high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Y

customer_reviews.title: Messy Chair- Food Lap
customer_reviews.text: Your child is guaranteed to end up very messy when using this chair to eat. The table does not slide close to the body so lots of food ends up all over a baby's lap and sides of the chair. Yes, the cover is easy to remove and wash, however, my baby needs a new outfit every time he eats. It is also not fun to remove all those crumbs and mushy baby bananas from the side of the chair. Also the chair does not adjust up and down. Gave two starts because it does do the job and my son sits comfortably but I am purchasing a different chair because it is too messy!
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 month old and instantly love it! I am going to have to buy another for the grandparents house to replace the cheap one I bought for now. I love that this seat can basically last my child until he can sit on his own and the colors are great too. I feel that my child is safe and secure while in this seat and he is quite alright with sitting in it. There is a lot of cushion on the seat and it looks like it is removable so it can be washed. The wheels lock but you can still move it around easily on tile so beware if you have a squirmy baby!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Elliott-Wiley

customer_reviews.title: JUST OKAY
customer_reviews.text: Overall this high chair is adequate. I have two concerns with it. 1. After it is fully assembled with the final cushion/padding the depth of the seat is very small. Fortunately, my Grand Daughter had a very tiny butt. 2. And, this is my failure to notice before I made the purchase, but the legs do not fold in and they are very wide so it is difficult to move through doorways. i.e. kitchen to dining room.
customer_reviews.author: granny70

customer_reviews.title: I put it together myself and it was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Atlfter lots of looking and research we bought this high chair for our first baby. I put it together myself and it was very easy to assemble. We started feeding our 4 month old baby food in it and it's great. It rolls easliy across he floor and seems to be very steady even when he's squirming around. The tray is easy to put on and off with one hand, which is great with a baby in hand. The tray wipes easily as does the fabric and the straps. I've not used it as a booster or a high chair yet but with as functionally great as it is as a high chair, I have high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: penguins&pumpkins

customer_reviews.title: I hate this high chair
customer_reviews.text: Wheels constantly get stuck, seat does not click into base- so it can come out easily. Tray tends to pop off if not pushed all the way in to the tightest setting. I hope I’m able to use the base part for a toddler seat. I’ve stopped using this chair and am looking for a replacement. Currently using our stroller. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy Day Reader

customer_reviews.title: so there is no way I might have done a bad assembly. They wheels are just crappy
customer_reviews.text: The back wheels don't turn that well, kind of have to drag the chair around. BTW, breaks are on the back, the wheels already come on the unit, so there is no way I might have done a bad assembly. They wheels are just crappy. If this unit would be on a store I wouldn't have purchased it due to the back wheels being stuck. I guess it could always be worse, so I give them 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar L.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Seat cover ripped the first time I gently washed it.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Sparks

customer_reviews.title: I would never have bought this! Back area of ...
customer_reviews.text: I would never have bought this! Back area of seat which straps down baby to it is connected to base so simply that it seems possible that it could disconnect. If this were to happen the baby could be pulled backwards with falling seat while still stapped to bottom based. Reporting this to cosumer reports
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Economical and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Definitely economical. 3 stars coz the brakes are pretty useless...on carpet and hardwood floor. My lanky one yr daughter pushes and pulls it easily on carpeted floor with brakes on. It’s even worse on tiled surface 😑. But she has never been hurt while doing that so the chair stays 😊
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: ... for a few months now and we have really liked it. Our daughter could not sit up on ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this highchair for a few months now and we have really liked it. Our daughter could not sit up on her own when we started using it at 4 months old and the recline plus 5 point harness were perfect for her. I love the easy one hand adjust on the recline. I can also pull out and ouch in the tray with one hand and it has a removable cover on the tray that is dishwasher safe. Only complaint is I had an extra piece when I assembled it, that I couldn't find out where it went! But everything works fine so I guess I didn't need it. Great item for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied, definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Very, very satisfied! The high chair is easy to assemble, looks great, easy to clean, and the perfect size for our needs. Initially we had a small broken piece on the footrest that inhibited it from snapping in place. The company was easy to contact, professional, and very prompt in sending us not only a new piece, but a whole new high chair! Thank you for your great customer service, much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but impossible to clean
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is great, in theory. But it is not practical. The underside of the tray hides all sorts of food debris in the innumerable cavities. The base of the seat traps food and cannot be cleaned out without disassembling the entire chair. Our chair constantly reeks of old, rotten food no matter how hard I work at trying to keep it clean. I would not recommend this highchair to other parents. I would not purchase another one like it.
customer_reviews.author: N LaMa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this once I introduced solids to my son. This works perfect, he is at table height. This is easy to clean. I like that is has two built in cup holders. It was super easy to assemble and rolls through carpet, wood, laminate. Its great that everything can be washed. I clean after every meal, so I have not noticed any problems of food getting stuck and I was the material about once ever 2-3 weeks depending on how dirty it might get.
customer_reviews.author: CSierra

customer_reviews.title: Not the best of chairs
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this chair. It is affordable, I like the second tray, and I like how the cloth part is easy to remove and wash. The color and design is cute as well. Now the negatives. This chair can barely roll because the wheels are terrible and the locks engage by themselves. It is difficult to get all food out of the compartment it falls into. It’s not the sturdiest, but it’s not too wobbly either. I wish I’d have just bought a better chair rather than going with an affordable one. I’ve never had to work so hard to get a chair to function/be clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: Love the ease of taking seat on and attaching to ...
customer_reviews.text: Within three days the tray where it connects to the chair broke. Love the ease of taking seat on and attaching to a chair - however, my son like to push against the table and chair tips back - thus cannot utilize this feature at this time. Seat is large - does not fold or store easily. Going to try and purchase a replacement tray - regardless of price - shouldn't break after such little use. Was also a pain to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Leif

customer_reviews.title: We really like that it can adapt to the growth of the ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this highchair for our grandchild. We really like that it can adapt to the growth of the baby as well. With all high chairs, there is that concern that while you put the tray on you could accidentally get their little arms caught. Not with this one, it is smooth and catches easily so that the tray is in place quickly and efficiently. Also, everything cleans up very easily too.
customer_reviews.author: dscsen2

customer_reviews.title: Horrible wheels, decent chair overall.
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with this chair is the wheels! I mean I wouldn't really call them wheels, as they don't roll on any type of surface. So, if you want a stationary high chair, this is a great option. Otherwise, pay a little more and get one with wheels that operate. Other than that, I love the removable tray surface, one hand button for easy removal of the whole tray while holding baby, harness that secures baby works well, seat cover is nice, and the height is good. Decent chair for the price, just doesn't roll anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Mom

customer_reviews.title: Overall glad I have it
customer_reviews.text: I've had it about a year and everything is great. I love having two trays- that comes in handy a lot. I love that it has wheels but they need to be better wheels. Casters would be perfect. The thin plastic wheels it has are pretty pathetic. They won't roll half the time, although when they do, I'm glad it has wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Mikyj

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this highchair to host my grandson at our house on occasion. It is lightweight and perfect for our needs. If I were buying this for daily use at every meal, I might want something a little heavier to last for years...but this is just fine for my grandsons' visits.
customer_reviews.author: bocadelrio

customer_reviews.title: The wheels on it stink!
customer_reviews.text: The wheels on the high chair is very hard to move around. They catch constantly. It’s a real downside when you’re trying to move your kid from point A to point B and you have to pick the whole thing up because it won’t roll. It’s easy to assemble and keep clean, no complaints there. You can probably find one for a little more in price and not have the wheel issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design. Even received a replacement with the same ...
customer_reviews.text: Wheels get stuck and don't maneuver the way they should. Poor design. Even received a replacement with the same issue of the wheels getting stuck and not being able to roll. Sent both items back and ordering a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna McClanahan

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure to block the whole
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I've had with this high chair is the wheels get stuck alot and doesn't roll across my kitchen floor. I did see the hole everyone is talking about in the buckle slot but I just put hot glue in it and it hasn't been an issue. Overall I think it's a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Lasts Forever, Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I used the highchair the entire time my son needed it. I love how easy the table part slides off to put him in as well as afterward to clean it. The chair cover also comes off so we easily threw it in the washer when we needed to. Overall great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair!
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is easy to take apart and clean. The only part I am not able to clean is the bottom buckle. Food gets trapped in the crack and I’m not sure how to take that apart to clean. Otherwise, it’s been a good high chair to have. I can take the top part off and travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because of the great reviews, and we do love the versatility of the chair, but our main complaint is about the mobility. We need a chair that can easily move around. The wheels on this chair are useless. They have just ended up scratching our floor since they don't swivel in the direction you are pushing or pulling the chair. We will keep it for the booster aspect, but will be looking for another solution for a wheeled, mobile high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Lady

customer_reviews.title: This is the cheapest I could find and I was totally surprise how awesome this chair actually is for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different brands from expensive ones to middle range to this one. This is the cheapest I could find and I was totally surprise how awesome this chair actually is for the price. It is very easy to set up and not bulky but stable. I love it. Bought 3 for myself and friends.
customer_reviews.author: shineBright

customer_reviews.title: The best high chair ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Its so versatile and so easy to clean!! Most other high chairs you can't even take the fabric off to wash and this one you can. Great for camping since you can take the top part off, and you can lean the seat back like a seat in a car, I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: GEL

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This high chair was much less expensive than other brands, so I was a bit worried about the quality. I am pleasantly surprised! It is well made, light weight, and very easy to assemble. It will grow with my granddaughter. It's very stable thanks to a broad front to back footprint, yet narrow enough to roll (wheels with locks) into the corner when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: AskDrCaryn

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair. It’s cute. Colors mostly match my dinning room. Easy to clean and use. My baby is a small 6m and it’s so adjustable we don’t have any issues other than the belts are as tight as they can go but still to loose on him. I wish it would fold up for traveling. But it does the job great!
customer_reviews.author: MakaylaMuncy

customer_reviews.title: It's okay....
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of everything this highchair can do and the pattern is cute. The tray pops off super easily, almost as if it isn't latching correctly. My husband was surprised at how much I paid for this and even more surprised by the original price, he would have guessed $30. At this point, I'm just using this until I can find a better quality chair.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnna Dedman

customer_reviews.title: This was a great choice to have for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: This was a great choice to have for my grandson. I liked the idea of the 3 stages that it would provide for, however I cannot see keeping it that long. For the price it's a good highchair. It does adjust but it looks like your forcing the movements, you literally have to pop it into each position, that's the cheapest thing about the highchair. Easy to attach and detach the tray, nice colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy G

customer_reviews.title: Ingenius high chair indeed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and works well so far for my 7 month old granddaughter. We have two of these one at the grandparent's house and one at the child's house. We all are greatly appreciating them very much so far. We are all impressed with the versatility of this high chair as the child grows. The tray removes and inserts easily for cleaning ease of use. It has two cup holders and is adjustable to allow for the child's growth. So glad we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Leswerks

customer_reviews.title: Good, wish it had duplicate accessories
customer_reviews.text: Good high chair, but i wish it came with a second removable cover and a second removable tray. Or, wish i had the option to purchase more. It's a hassle cleaning them after every messy meal, so baby ends up sitting in dried red sauce more often then not the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: No very stable
customer_reviews.text: This chair is cheaply made. My 1 year old almost flipped it back. The chair didn't clip into the base enough to be sturdy. Probably okay for a baby just learning to eat but I'm returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Melton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies and toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is amazing! Very easy to put together. My 6 month old sits in it very comfortably and the back can easily be adjusted for a better angle. I let my 4 year old sit on the main portion (without the booster and high chair portion) and it was very comfortable. He had no complaints. I'm very l glad I purchased it! I was looking for a heavy duty high chair and I got exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: J powell

customer_reviews.title: Great chair but one design flaw where the strap comes ...
customer_reviews.text: Great chair but one design flaw where the strap comes up between the legs there is a gap in the plastic for it but you cannot take that strap out to clean in that area and of course as baby is eating food items are falling into that section and cannot be cleaned out. Outside of that its a great chair and good height for our kitchen island where it is most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: VinnyR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Have had it about 3 yrs now and it’s great with the exception of the back wheels have never moved right. However it does take a licking.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Had it for 2 days like most everything
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 2 days like most everything! Amazing for the proce will be buying another one of the same exact color and everything for my house.(first one was for my moms house) the only thing that does not work supwr great are the wheels. They go back and forth but not good at changing directions. I feel it would be better with better wheels and pay extra or like a slippery bottom so it slides better? Just a thought
customer_reviews.author: Marta Bracken

customer_reviews.title: The tray was also not great and on occasion was hard for someone to secure ...
customer_reviews.text: Awful, Awful, Awful. The straps are removable for washing, put them back on and they did hold very well. The tray was also not great and on occasion was hard for someone to secure in if they are unfamiliar with it for example a relative. On a few occasions family member or care giver did not click the tray in ( even though it seemed secure for quite a while -- like 30 mins ) and it fell off . I didn't feel this was safe enough based on a few things. Plus no adjustable height. Spend the extra money and get a safe high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence P.

customer_reviews.title: Eh...it was a gamble buying a restocked item.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting the box to be so jacked and it was definitely used. All the pieces and parts were just thrown in the box and squished to fit. There was dried up food on the eating tray. A few more scuffs than I expected but product was intact. Probably won't buy an item like this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have this to my son just before he turned 4 mos. I love that it has 2 trays and how the back adjusts. For the features and price point, I am pretty happy with it. I feel like it is maybe a little cheap looking but not enough for me to want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: lucky1

customer_reviews.title: Love the versatility
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and the tray is easy to slide on and off, clean and is sturdy. Only con is the wheels don't roll very well and frequently lock up. We have a tile floor, maybe it isn't smooth enough?
customer_reviews.author: Alleyson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We are loving the chair! My one year old daughter just wants to sit in it all the time, throwing a fit when we make her get down. The only thing I don't like is the gap at the bottom where the strap comes up from is big enough for small food/juice to fall into BUT we plugged it up as soon as we put it together, so not that big of a deal!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair for grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: I received my Ingenuity Trio 3 in 1 Ridgeline high chair, found very easy to assemble. I have two grandchildren one 8 months the other 15 months, makes easy to seat both at once at table . I can place the youngest in the part with tray by attaching to dining room chair, while the other uses the vase as booster seat. Works perfect . Glad I got this high chair solved seating problems much easier in this chair than holding and feeding. Makes easy and everyone happy.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. So easy to clean and assemble. Such an important feature for baby-led-weaning and raising an independent child.
customer_reviews.author: Pavs

customer_reviews.title: ... had many others and these are by far my favorite, also love that they change to fit your ...
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these high chairs and I have had many others and these are by far my favorite , also love that they change to fit your needs with the three options of how to use them. Wonderful high chair . My 4 month old and two year old both do great in these chairs .
customer_reviews.author: Erica L Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Great highchair!
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews I finally decided on this high chair. We actually have several because we have lots of grandkids that are over all the time. This one I wanted to use for when we eat outside. It was super easy to put together and is very easy to keep clean. Love that it can be used 2 different ways. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryllyn Tallman

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this high chair is ok. Not great, but will work for our last baby. It is a little flimsy, and The seat part is quite small for our large 17 pound 5 month old's large thighs (the plastic knob that goes in between the legs creates a very tight space). However, I do love the option of having an extra seat for an older toddler. That makes it worth it. Also, the colors are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JK13

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for our grandson and liked it so much - bought a second one to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson and liked it so much - bought a second one to have here at Grandma's house. Easy to operate. Only downside is the feet have a very large spread. Takes up lots of floor space - wish they were a little more compact as its not great for a smaller space
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: We got this highchair because of its small footprint but have been surprised at its functionality. The tray is a nice size, the reclining options are really helpful for bottle feeding and it moves pretty well. For the price, we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Long Islander

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a grandmother of a set of absolutely beautiful 9 month old granddaughters. I bought 2 of these high chairs for my house and am very pleased with the quality at such a good price. Thanks so much!!
customer_reviews.author: angie reardon

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: durable, easy to clean, hasn't broken in over 2 years. Love that it is 3-in-1 and that has been the best part. My son enjoyed sitting on the bottom part while he put a doll in the top half to eat dinner with the family. Worth the money, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here! It's easy to get my son in and out of this high chair, and it's pretty easy to clean. I haven't figured out how to get one of the straps off, but the rest is easy. I also like that it's so steady because now that he's crawling, he has started pulling it around and sitting underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Wheel lock broke
customer_reviews.text: Was working great out of the box but after a while, the wheels kept locking. We had to break the wheel lock so we can move the chair without dragging. Other than that, chair works fine. Love that the tray is big so he can play on it while we're in the kitchen. Also love that it reclines so when we feed him milk, it makes it a bit easier for him.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Wheels do not roll
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this high chair specifically because it had wheels and would move around easily. The wheels are so cheap they don’t even roll. We will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The chair is good makes The work i didnt put 5 stars because ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair is good makes The work i didnt put 5 stars because it feels like a cheap material compared to graco Chairs, and my baby doesn't feel very comfortable With the part that goes between the legs. If i had money i Would buy The graco blossom they have good quality material. thats why we have to share before buy
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: This a great chair. I feel very comfortable putting my grandkids in it. Very safe and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: RONNIE WESTBERRY

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, versatile and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, versatile, and super easy to clean. Even can be used for two kids. With the tip.being strapped to a chair for a younger kid and the bottom being pushed up.to the table for bigger kids. Great product, love the quality for the price@
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job done
customer_reviews.text: I like this chair, someone gave me one for the baby shower which was too fancy but really flimsy (it's in a closet now). The only thing I dislike about this high chair are the straps, I feel like my baby is going to fall out (but he hasn't thank God). I recommend it, its a great price, and steady enough.
customer_reviews.author: RAIN ROD

customer_reviews.title: Only wish the tray was larger but nice because there is a tray shield over the real ...
customer_reviews.text: Only wish the tray was larger but nice because there is a tray shield over the real tray. As well, the seat belt must be on immediately when baby is in chair as baby will easily topple out when tray is not on - seat is not deep enough to keep baby in without the seat belt. Wipes up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: arizona

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This thing is phenomenal. I love that I can just take the top portion off and move my daughter into the bathroom if I need a shower or put her in the living room if we are having an informal dinner. Easy to clean also. Beware though when removing the top not to tilt the chair backwards or you will have a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: After having about a month of usage out of this high chair, we love it! Our daughter seems very comfortable in it. The cover is easy to clean, along with the tray, since the white topper is removable.
customer_reviews.author: Singlephaser

customer_reviews.title: not overly impressed
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Inexpensive (purchased for $60 on sale on amazon) I like that it has wheels Cons: the recline option is always tilting back when baby pushes against it there is a large gap between the baby and the tray the tray is fiddly, comes off easily and is obnoxious to put on again (look for one that rotates open instead of just comes off) it's wiggly/not very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Simple high chair. Had it for about a year ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple high chair. Had it for about a year now. It has taken a beating and it is still up for the count. It was decently priced when I bought it. I doesn't have a lot of bells and whistles but that is what you are paying for. 4 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Works well for visits from grandchildren.
customer_reviews.text: This high chair works well for my needs which are Occasional visits from my grandchildren. This is a very low quality high chair that would not stand up to extended and daily use. Very easy to put together and versatile as a three in one highchair.
customer_reviews.author: Joyfull

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Great high chair, comfortable and easy to clean. We absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The tray is easy to put on and lock into place and the ...
customer_reviews.text: We just moved near our kids and wanted a high chair when our grandchild comes to visit. This will fit the child for several years because it converts to a toddler chair and a booster seat. The tray is easy to put on and lock into place and the tray liner removes easily for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: D. Weiskircher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my grandson. They just love it. They have used it as a highchair and took the legs off to use as a mobile chair going to a friends. I was very pleased with my choice. Very fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Simpson

customer_reviews.title: This is THE BEST baby chair ever
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST baby chair ever! is really confortable, the design is beautiful and functional. The chair itself is really light, easy to move around, and it was really easy and fast to assemble. Love all the presets that can be used with this one, I love you can transform it for 3 different stages. It is a really good bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Alejlinares

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend -- returning before using
customer_reviews.text: The booster seat would not lock to the base when I went to assemble the chair. It slipped off without using the release every time with minimal force to pull it. As other reviewers said, the plastic felt somewhat cheap, but I am returning because of the safety issue. I don't feel safe having my kids in it, especially since it has issues when it is in "new" condition. I'm not sure it would wear well.
customer_reviews.author: mleb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very functional! On chair that can see a child through from baby to toddler. Easy to use! The harness is nice as it keeps the child in the seat and prevents them from falling on top of the tray. The dual tray is very handy as I can wash the top tray and still have a tray for my grandson to play on.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene West

customer_reviews.title: We love this product
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. The little one loves to sit in it and it is so easy to get them in and out of. I like the fact that the table has a removeable top. This makes it a breeze to clean up. Rolls around ok, but we don't move it that much. It is definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Use it for two kids.. and it's a great solution of keaping one spot but use it in different ways! Great idea!!!
customer_reviews.author: AppleSuperFan

customer_reviews.title: this does a fine job and serves it's purpose well
customer_reviews.text: For a high chair on the cheaper end of the price spectrum, this does a fine job and serves it's purpose well. easy to clean. Easy to remove tray (even while holding toddler in one arm). Only complaint is that the wheels don't roll over our wood floors, they slide, but not a big deal for us.
customer_reviews.author: amarkofmyown

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: We have it all put together it our son isn’t old enough to use it but it’s easy to assemble and will clean easy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great features
customer_reviews.text: many great features such as recline, 3 different setups and the tray surface pops off. It would be perfect if the tray were to hang by the side for loading and unloading. Also the legs could be more stable. The short extensions seem to be there to reduce packaging size at the expense is stability over uneven surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice high chair
customer_reviews.text: Good high chair . I used this for my baby for 2 years and then I sold it. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: keerthi

customer_reviews.title: Great High Chair!
customer_reviews.text: This product has so many features, my Daughter is finding new features every time she comes over. It even reclines. Sturdy, easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Zettey 37

customer_reviews.title: I love how versatile this highchair is but I have concerns ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how versatile this highchair is but I have concerns on how cheap this product feels. Also the highchair seat/ chair booster isn't really big. I am kind of having buyers remorse but at the same time too lazy too ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Spracklen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect High Chair! 💕
customer_reviews.text: I love how there’s two chairs in one. There have been quite a few babies born in my family and friends groups this year, and I can accommodate two babies at a time with this chair. I love how it’s on wheels and easy to clean and take apart. It doesn’t take up a lot of space either, which is nice. I’m 100% satisfied with this product and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Baby table, high chair, gift for baby
customer_reviews.text: It is really good priced, clean, comfortable high chair. My kid is using it many months and likes it. Easy to clean. I hope I am using it until 3 years old. I advice for new parents that you need to buy it earlier. And convenient for a gift. One of my good purchase for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Ichiko

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly in my awkwardly shaped kitchen area.
customer_reviews.text: Added bonus, when my friends bring their littles over or we babysit, we take the seat off the base and have seats for both kids. Hadn't even thought of that.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Everything  but fold !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not the right choice for an occasional visitor unless you have lots of storage because this does NOT FOLD. It does grow with the child however. Didn’t make the right choice for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Gia C.

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this chair for 3-4 years. It's still good as the day I bought it. Very much worth the price and it has been used by my two daughters. I would 100% reccomend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Wheel are crappy but good product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described and in a timely manner. My only complaint right now would be the wheels, they are a bit crappy and dont roll properly but overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Crystall Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. the thing I love most about it is the table and the removable cover on it. I able to clean it before I take my child out and not have to worry about cleaning everything while my daughter runs around. More time with my child!
customer_reviews.author: Jwarthen

customer_reviews.title: Easily rocks back and forth making me feel my baby ...
customer_reviews.text: Easily rocks back and forth making me feel my baby isn't totally stable. Easy to clean, would be great if the back support had an additional notch to have my baby sit closer to the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this high chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair. It has all the functions I want it to have. It's lightweight and easy to clean. However, my only complaint is the rolling wheels always get jammed and the brake flap always falls down.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: however I would love it if ALL the straps were removable
customer_reviews.text: The seat cover and some straps are removable, however I would love it if ALL the straps were removable. My son just had a diaper explosion and I ended up having to take the whole chair portion of the high chair into the shower to get it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Seems more comfortable and the baby doesn't make as much of a ...
customer_reviews.text: We started with this then changed to a more expensive wood one, we recently switched back to this one. Seems more comfortable and the baby doesn't make as much of a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ingenuity Trio 3-in-1 High Chair – Ridgedale - High Chair, Toddler Chair, and Booster
product_meta.description: Color:RidgedaleAs every parent knows, kids grow up fast. The Trio 3 in 1 High Chair easily adjusts from full size high chair to booster seat to toddler chair – so it’s the only chair you’ll need as your tiny baby becomes a big kid. This modern high chair design features cheerful chevron stripes, making this a great baby seat for girls or boys. The chair wipes clean instantly and features a dishwasher safe tray and washing machine safe seat pad, so you can slow down the clock by spending less time on kitchen cleanup and more time with your family. The EasyClean tray also features four locking positions to grow with your baby. And as your family expands, it can too. When used as a booster and toddler chair, it can seat two children at the same time. Minimum age 6 months. Maximum age 60 months .
feature_bullets: Wipeable and washable design for easier cleaning
Convertible high chair becomes booster and toddler seat
Keeps little ones secure with 3 point and 5 point harnesses
Extra soft seat keeps baby comfortable. Wipe the metal frame with soft, clean cloth and mild soap

specifications.Care instructions: Seat pad is machine-washableTray is dishwasher safeWipe clean
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,431 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
